poem:
Title: "Chiastic Cry for Commons' Care"

Harriet,
In the choke of newsprint
calls –– on Sunak, on Starmer,
to distill peace from the perilous campaign.
To safeguard the seats of governance,
no violence lurking.
A conference convened, a cause echoed––
silencing the notion, menacing and unjust,
that threat is the deserving lot 
of those in white halls.
Do not collude. Listen, address and succor.
